attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if the government legalised cannabis it would be able to tax it, increasing revenue, and help in the control of it similar to alcohol and tobacco.
im not going to claim it is good for you, although some medicinal benefits are shown, but it is no worse than alcohol.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
